author: Staff Reporter
text:
A disaster was averted at Chennai Airport as Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) officials acted promptly and extinguished a fire that broke out from a battery unit of a baggage-handling vehicle on Thursday.

The incident occurred when fuel-refilling procedure was on at a Sri Lankan Airlines aircraft carrying 124 passengers that was scheduled to leave for Colombo at 9.30 a.m.
title: Minor fire at airport
